item.title: Physint – first poster and cast members unveiled
item.content:encoded:
Charlee Fraser, Don Lee, and Minami Hamabe confirmed.

Publisher Sony Interactive Entertainment and developer Kojima Productions have released the first poster for Physint, the January 2024-announced action espionage game, as well as confirmed that Charlee Fraser, Don Lee, and Minami Hamabe will appear as cast members.

Here is the poster and logo:

Platforms and a release date for Physint have yet to be announced.



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/09/physint-first-poster-and-cast-members-unveiled

item.title: OD ‘KNOCK’ teaser trailer
item.content:encoded:
"For all players and screamers."

Publisher Xbox Game Studios and developer Kojima Productions have released a new teaser trailer for horror game OD, dubbed “KNOCK” and running in Unreal Engine 5.

The following new poster was also released:

Platforms and a release date for OD have yet to be announced.

Watch the teaser trailer below.

“KNOCK” Teaser Trailer

Japanese



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/09/od-knock-teaser-trailer

item.title: Escape from Duckov launches October 16
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Top-down looter-extraction shooter dated.

Top-down player-versus-environment looter-extraction shooter Escape from Duckov will launch for PC via Steam and Epic Games Store on October 16, publisher Bilibili and developer Team Soda announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via its store pages:

About

After waking up from a strange dream, you find yourself in Duckov’s world.

There are various enemies hiding outside around your shelter. After leaving, you need to explore cautiously and try to collect supplies for your future.

There’s no time to explain, rookie duck! Becoming a stronger soldier is what you need most now!

Key Features

  • Fight Your Enemies – Can’t defeat them head-on? How about some back-stabbing! It’s a cruel world, do what’s best to survive.
  • Explore the Areas – Loot the maps! Whatever they are, take them all!
  • Build Your Base – Build this base of your own. Make the empty basement busy. Medical stations, armament racks, gyms and a cozy duck nest, it’s all up to you.
  • Customize Your Weapons – The items you find in the maps can be made into powerful weapons.
  • Make Friends – Talk with all the NPCs, and gradually discover the truth about this world. Is there a friend or enemy ahead waiting for you? Better beware, good luck!

Anyway, explore this last habitable land of the duck paradise, and find out the truth about Duckov!

Watch a new trailer below.

Release Date Trailer

English

Japanese



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/09/escape-from-duckov-launches-october-16
